page.title: 04FARMING,EVENTS
page.content: Every year the farmers from around {Newton,Manley}and{Kingsley}organise a{ {Ploughing Contest.}The objective is to see who can plough the neatest furrows over all different types of ground. There is also a {Best Kept Village {Competition}held every five years ,{ {Crowton}a nearby village holds it at the moment.There was a{fun run}in aid of a {wheelchair}path running through the forest.There are also a number of fetes such as {Blakelees}and the{Hurst fetes. Around{75%}of the area we are surveying is farmland,which consists mostly of{Dairy}and{Arable } products.There are 3 milk distribution farms.There is an abattoir down the road from Kingsley.There is also a piggery and sheep are kept on the higher ground.
